text: Halroy Candis "Hal" Williams (born December 14, 1938) is an American actor. He was born in Columbus, Ohio. Williams is best known for his role as Police Officer Smith on Sanford and Son (1972–76) and as Lester Jenkins, the husband of Marla Gibbs's character, on the NBC sitcom 227 (1985–90). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Columbus, Ohio
title: Hal Williams
